content: it constantly looses progress on my python course. i can't even skip the ones i already did. ----- update since the issue was resolved. the courses are overall a good starting point and it's fun to click through in an duolinge-esque style, just for programming. usually i don't need more than a few days per course. the more text heavy courses really need some polishing though. there are typos and weirdly structured sentences which makes reading difficult sometimes.
replyContent: Hi Leonie, We totally understand the frustration caused by us. Kindly reach us at Hello@prghub.com so that we can provide you solutions as soon as possible. Apologize for the issue caused . -JP
